Description: The top level 17-21 WRC variant, known as WRC+ which now is anticipating BRC, equipped with H4DPA 1.6L i4 engine, 2.5 bar anti-lag turbo with 36mm restrictor, active center differential with hydrualic clutch disengage mechanism and 6-speed sequential transmission. Gravel spec has over 300mm of suspension travel and 300mm brake discs. This setup should be a good starting point.
